name: Cubiti pARti
description:
The p-AR-ti Is On!

NOW - Tilt Five Enabled, compete against PC and Mobile players

Up to 4 players can compete online in this insanely fun real-time party game!

pARti with your friends online in real-time multiplayer tournaments or get competitive against random players!

Compete against players on iOS and Android as well as PC with cross-platform play.

- Hit the basketball court and shoot the hoops in Hoopshot!
- Test your ultimate skills with the epic Dash Hurdles!
- Think fast in Smashi in this uniquely fun twist on Wack-a-mole!
- Smash goals against your friends in Ricochet Ace!
- Challenge your reactions as you master the Dodge Arena!
- Race to the top of the tower in Danger Climb!

With over 50 fun Cubiti characters to select, you can discover YOUR favourite Cubiti and show them off online.

Will you dare to be square?
